title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 342.5 - Filing period; disability retirement options
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 342.5 - Filing period; disability retirement options

State Regulations

An option election with respect to retirement on account of
disability may be filed within 30 days after mailing by the Comptroller of
notification of approval of retirement on account of
disability. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
342.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
